Easy to play, but hard to master. It is fun, noob rewarding. Casual and competitive modes are both alive with lots of players. ranking works perfectly fine in competitive.
cool shooter but I would recommend everyone buying prime, since there are many hackers if you play without

The game is great, the players are toxic af...

Possivelmente é o jogo mais viciante, frustrante e gratificante que já joguei.
É um dos melhores jogos FPS competitivos. Você precisará ter boa pontaria, senso de jogo e paciência, juntamente com a prática regular, se quiser melhorar.
Quanto ao lado ruim, o matchmaking há muitos hackers.
Cel mai misto joc ma joc cu Radoco

if you start playing this game know that you will lose over 2000 hours of your life

游戏从16年断断续续玩至今，免费我可以理解，但是自从免费了我第一次在这游戏上面遇到挂，国服吧，一把竞技就遇到大陀螺，竞技有就算了，军备跟休闲也有，骂他们，他们还说没事，随便举报反正三块钱一个号。打国际服吧，一把休闲里面有两个大陀螺跟一个透视自瞄。我玩nm 都是些是妈仔开挂，我不骂你，我骂你妈怎么生了你这个狗jb玩游戏还开挂
